# 1) optional: clear any old local bundle cache
Remove-Item -Recurse -Force .\vendor -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue
Remove-Item -Force .\Gemfile.lock -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue
# 2) run Jekyll in an official container (maps your project in)             
docker run --rm -it -p 4000:4000 `
  -v "${PWD}:/srv/jekyll" `
  -v "${PWD}/vendor/bundle:/usr/local/bundle" `
  jekyll/jekyll:4 `
  bash -lc "bundle install && bundle exec jekyll serve --host 0.0.0.0"
